response.original_title: 我们一起游荡在高墙的缝隙中，然后被冲进下水道
response.overview: A verbose essay film, making a mountain out of a molehill. Due to Covid-19, exploratory field trips to the countryside turned into school trips. Just when we thought we were going to be bored through the trip, we noticed the "stalacitites" growing on the buildings of the school. And so, as we explored, a hidden ecosystem, hidden behind the neat facade of the school buildings, slowly unraveled. And of course, we didn't intend to stop at just finding them...
response.tagline: Making a mountain out of a molehill.
response.title: We Wandered Through The Cracks Of The Walls And Were Consumed By The Toilet
